data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample ARAP-251

Exposition SE, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Flachmoor, Tree line 3500 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 2%, Herb cover 80%, Vegatation type: Tiefgr. feucht. Fi/Fö-Stao. Perio. überschw. , Film number: 670G
